downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics GP 2010 White Paper: Accessibility for People with Disabilities
downloadDescription: This white paper describes how to make Microsoft Dynamics GP more accessible for everyone to use.
detailsSection:
Microsoft is committed to making its products and services easier for everyone to use. This document provides information about the features that make Microsoft Dynamics GP more accessible for people with disabilities.

This document discusses the following topics:
  • Keyboard shortcuts for the menu bar, toolbar, windows, tools, and other common shortcuts
  • Toolbar customization information
  • User-specific changes to the display options
  • Macro information
  • Application shortcuts to windows, SmartList favorites, macros, web pages, and external tasks
  • Accessibility features in the Microsoft Dynamics GP Help and in Windows
systemRequirementsSection: • To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the document in PDF or XPS file format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
  3. Repeat these steps on each computer where you want to install the document, or save the file to a shared folder where other others can access it.
